website_summaries.verdict: A durable, handheld diving flashlight that is rated for a depth of up to 150 m.
pros: VOLADOR's diving flashlight is constructed using aircraft-grade aluminum alloy and has a maximum brightness of 1,000 lumens
There are 4 modes (high, medium, low, and strobe), and the battery will last roughly an hour on the brightest setting
cons: you must cycle through all the modes to get the one you want, and there is no adjustment to change the focus of the light

customer_reviews.title: *** UPDATE**** Outstanding customer service!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an update. After I initially wrote my one star review, the company reached out to me on their own and sent me a new flashlight free of charge. This is OUTSTANDING customer service. The very fact that they took the initiative and contacted me says a lot. That alone was worth the cost of the flashlight. The new one works great!! Worked great first time. Followed instructions, put silicone on the seals, dried it, stored it in cool dry place, charged battery.......AND.......second time I tried to use it............nothing!!! Doesn’t turn on. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Primary light for day or night use- 11 underwater hours of testing
customer_reviews.text: Spent a week of day and night diving in Cozumel Mexico using this light. Nice bright white light which beats all the other divers older style lights. Bright mode is great for illuminating under the coral and rocks during the daytime and the mid and dim modes worked great for night diving. I did have some issues with corrosion developing in the salt air (in the hotel) on the internal battery compartment contacts when charging the battery over night, which required cleaning all the contacts with alcohol and a q-tip every morning to keep the light working but otherwise it was a great primary dive light and I couldn't be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: Operates underwater
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little dive light that worked perfectly. I was able to operate the light underwater turning it on and changing brightness. Operating at a depth of 125ft.
customer_reviews.author: Rich2dive

customer_reviews.title: Nice light everyone who dove with me lived it
customer_reviews.text: I Liked the light but the lost the button on 3rd dive but without me even asking the company instantly emailed me and said they would send a replacement out. Besides the one issue it was a great light and would definitely buy it again because of the way the customer service handled my issue without me even asking them too.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: VERY bright dive light
customer_reviews.text: I've used this as my primary light on 4 or 5 dives in cold, fresh water from ~80'-100' and this light has performed very well. The light is very, very bright on its highest setting. The other two settings are also quite bright depending on where you are and what you are looking for. The rechargeable battery is a nice touch and easy to use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: 50% Fail rate so far.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 lights, one doesn't work. For me, and those with a rudimentary grasp of math is a 50% fail rate. Brigntess on the one that works was fine, although no water test, but out of the box it's completely unacceptable. I'm going to return the defective unit and will give all of you a longer term review of the operating unit. Until then, buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: R. Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Works better and lasts longer compared to my $150+ Big Blue
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of these torches for backup and for when I'm instructing night dives; they honestly work better, and last longer, than any name brand expensive torch I own or have used. I've never had a leak issue, I've left them unwashed and covered in salt water for days at a time, and they just keep working. They are very bright, brighter than my other name brand 1000 lumen torch that costs almost 4x as much, battery lasts for multiple hour long dives, they charge quick and use a standard easy to find battery (popular battery for vaping), and they are small. Have dropped and whacked them plenty as well.
customer_reviews.author: dub

customer_reviews.title: Best all weather flashlight for this price range
customer_reviews.text: Very inexpensive for the quality and ease of use for this dive flashlight. I take this out night snorkeling and it does a great job at lighting up my surroundings. My friend actually prefers this over his more expensive one because they are about the same brightness but the magnetic button is much easier to use to adjust brightness settings underwater than a twist function. These rechargeable battery is also a great inclusion for this price point so you don't have to worry about how much battery life you have. I have had this product for about 8 months now and have had no problems so far!
customer_reviews.author: Robert G Geer

customer_reviews.title: Great as a back up light
customer_reviews.text: I did 3 night dives in the PNW with this light. The beam was definitely bright enough and the click to turn on switch was easy to operate. It’s good value for the money but I think I want a brighter and more ergonomic light for my primary. I wish the beam was adjustable. I wanted to see over a larger area and could not because the beam was too focused and straight out. I missed a lot of things in my surroundings because of it. Other divers with cone shaped beams lit up more area. This is a great backup light or day diving light otherwise, good for look under crevices where fish hide.
customer_reviews.author: Ketty

customer_reviews.title: Super bright!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a dive trip to Cozumel in November 2018. I used it during 6 day dives and it really helped see things under the ledges and in the swim throughs. Also used on one night dive. They provided a large flashlight to use as the primary. I carried this one as a backup. Towards the end of the dive I tried both at the same time. I should have used this one as the primary! Less than half the size and much brighter. I picked this model over cheaper lights because of the push button activation. I didn't want to mess with twist on models. No leaks up to 90 feet down. Three levels of brightness.
customer_reviews.author: TheChinaman

customer_reviews.title: It'll do, bright ready to use
customer_reviews.text: The light is easy to use, very bright under water. No water leaks after a 65 foot dive. The only thing I don't like is you have to take it apart to charge it. While it did come with extra O rings, this will eventually be it's demise by water intrusion. Plus it's a pain the rear to do. The charger seems cheap and it says you must watch it and remove the battery as soon as it's charged as there is no over charge protection.
customer_reviews.author: Mike O.

customer_reviews.title: Bright, Fades Quickly, Turns on Too Easily, But Very Affordable
customer_reviews.text: 1) Brighter than the average dive flashlight, especially for the $$. 2) Fades quickly after the 20 minute mark. I took 2 with me & swapped them half way through dive. 3) I kept these in my pockets during day-dives & they would both turn on. Push button on back is too sensitive. 4) I dove next to a guy with a $480 Sola Dive 2500. I just turned my light off when next to him, his Sola was so bright it was like daylight. So if you have the cash, get a Sola, if not, get 2-3 of these.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S

customer_reviews.title: Great torch
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed. I've done a lot of diving over many years (hunting and gathering) and found this is an excellent torch for caves and crevices. Very compact, solid and excellent illumination. I was going to use it as my back up torch but it's now my main torch! I'm off to Truk Lagoon next month to dive the wrecks so it will get a good trial there.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Dartnall

customer_reviews.title: Great light for the money.
customer_reviews.text: When you see a lot of other dive lights you see them for double or triple this price. So I was a little skeptical at 1st. I'm glad I took the chance I have had this light down to 130ft with no issues the battery on high has lasted me for a dive (45mins) but it probably could last longer. The nice thing about this light is I'm not worried about losing it on a dive because it's so cheap I can just purchase another. This is definitely worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: The Bearded Diver

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Nice design.
customer_reviews.text: Update - 2019 we took these along on several trips now, Similain Islands night diving, swim through in Hawaii and the Cenotes in Mexico. Batteries never died out. Switch function is easy to use. Brightest setting isn’t always needed. Having the ability to decrease the intensity is a plus. Can’t believe how great they are. Considering the price! 2018 - Really really really bright! Don't use out of water for very long. The LED needs to be cool. It will begin flashing once it heats up. Under water this is NOT an issue. Easy to recharge. The switch is easy to access. Used it for a wreck dive. Can't wait to use it for a night dive.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Volador Scuba flashlight with magnetic switch
customer_reviews.text: I was going to return this light at first. You have to screw the head fully down to get it to work. Also there might have been a piece of clear plastic over the battery head that I did not see. Anyway I took it on a night dive and used it a few times during the day dives. I never recharged the battery, it really lasts. I like the magnetic switch. It is very easy to use. I put silicone grease on the o-rings. I am glad it comes with an extra set of rings. My complaint is that for scuba it would be better to be more of a flood light that such an intense spot light.
customer_reviews.author: Home Theater Buff

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have any dives planned due to Corona, so I couldn't put the light through real life trials. Best solution I had was to tie to to a string and leave it in my pond. I threw it into my pond and let it sit at the bottom for an hour. As I pulled the light in I could see it shinning bright under water and it was as good as new when I pulled it out. Minus some aquatic plants that it was tangled in.
customer_reviews.author: zach cleere

customer_reviews.title: Bravo!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome diving flashlight, great switch-feel, nice clean beam, high 1000 lumens output,beautiful netural white tint.The adjustable lanyard is a nice thick “rope” type with the little slider thingy attached. The charger and battery combo has given me more than enough light to peer into places I cannot touch as this is a marine reserve. The push button cycles through progressive increases of light power and as the battery starts to drain it doesn't fade it just doesn't increase to full lumens. But this doesn't occur for a few hours. I can go the whole day without a recharge. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great diving light
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little diving light at a very reasonable cost. Three selectable levels of illumination makes seeing in the dark easy. Also the lowest level of light allows viewing sea creatures without scaring them away. I took this light to a depth of 125 feet with no issues. Charging is quick. Only concern is how long the o-ring will last since the battery has to be removed and externally charged.
customer_reviews.author: mlevlotrfan

customer_reviews.title: Best light hands down!
customer_reviews.text: One of our fave amazon purchases! We use this flashlight for everything! Sits on our bedside nightstand and is easy to grab and go when needed! Lights up on different levels but they are all very bright! We used these last week while hunting crab at night on the beach’ The kids and adult loved it! We also used in the water while night swimming and used during our scuba diving excursion! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Buratowski

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: I took this to the lake, it works great. The battery last forever and it’s super bright. I’m keeping this one in our camper and I’m thinking about ordering another one just to keep at our house. You can never have too many flashlights living in tornado alley. You won’t be disappointed with this light. I will probably order an extra battery or 2 to have on hand as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Special Flashlight
customer_reviews.text: The product also has a large and heavy battery. However, this product is a special light that is waterproof. In summer camping, you can see a lot of effects on water play or fishing. A necklace made of rubber that can be worn around the neck is also provided. The quality is so great that it is made for special purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dive light
customer_reviews.text: I loved having this light on my dive at Anacapa in CA. The deepest we went was about 55 ft (16.8M) so nothing too crazy. Way brighter than the cheap green "best seller" or "recommended" light that someone with me had bought and it has a better depth rating. It didn't leak at all. The button was easy to use, especially since I was wearing 3mm gloves with kevlar palm/fingers. It's worth the extra cash.
customer_reviews.author: tdnelson48

customer_reviews.title: Excellent budget light
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this right before doing my open water checkout dives at Ginnie Springs, FL. I was looking for a waterproof dive light that wouldn't break the bank. So far the max depth I've had it was 50 ft, but it was very bright while exploring the cavern. I like the fact they included extra o-rings as well as the battery and charger. Another feature that is a nice touch in a light like this is the magnetic switch instead of a twist. Everything I read said this would be much less likely to leak at depth and so far, so good!. Very pleased and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Bright and reliable. Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight is pretty amazing. I took it on a deep dive with low visibility during my training and it worked wonders. After 15+ dives while using the flashlight, not once have I had an issue. The charging is simple and the modes of brightness useful.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Ultra Bright Wateproof Dive Light
customer_reviews.text: I needed one of these lights for a night dive in Catalina Island and this one worked perfectly for that. It lasted the whole 40 min dive and easy extremely easy to use with my thick gloves. The product seems to be well built and should last a long time. It is almost too bright UW at night, I use medium brightness for most of the dive. The 18650 battery is interchangeable with many other battery formats so I'm happy with that as well. I can't complain and will probably get another one for my Wife!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Life

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but bit pricey ..Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the good product I have used and works very well. I am an engineer for aircraft so when we do our work we need bright light and it does not matter if it is 90° F or -35° F Clear, Raining or Snowing outside. Few times I have lost my good light due to dropped in water or just normal use and some how water go in there. After initial use I have no issues that I can report right now. So far it's amazing product and can recommend to someone for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Priyank

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my AOW Night Dive certification in 50 degree fahrenheit water and it was awesome! Everyone complimented on how bright it was and how well made it was. The entire light with the strap just looks good and it seems like it's made of really durable materials. The 3 o rings is a plus as well. More peace of mind against water damage. All in all for the price its a must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 15 dives then died!
customer_reviews.text: Very poor piece of equipment. Could not adjust focus of light other than high, med and low and only lasted for 15 dives even though the battery shows fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic easy to use torch
customer_reviews.text: Used it on 7 day liveaboard for day and night dives in Oman. Fantastic handling, love the 3 light intensity levels. Super to use with one hand and genius easy push button at the back end of the torch. Super water tight at the 28 m we dove. Also very sturdy, used it to hold onto things or keep distance from. In the end its a tool you have to rely on especially in night dives. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Markus Leppert

customer_reviews.title: 4th one bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th one I’ve purchased and the other 3 are still going strong. - enough said.
customer_reviews.author: MDMo

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: Super bright, easy to use, the battery last very long, I bought it for my work, I worked at the warehouse, some products on the rack about 22’ high, I really cannot see the item, but with this flashlight, i am so easy to see the item number on the top shelves.
customer_reviews.author: anthea

customer_reviews.title: Great batter life on first use
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for a night dive and they both worked for over and hour. It was only 12 feet deep so I didn’t test under deep water pressure, but these lights worked great. I will come back and update this review once I’ve used them more. So far, great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: David Ralph

customer_reviews.title: the product is made of good quality material and the seller is responsive to customer feedback
customer_reviews.text: It's very bright and you would not need to use the maximum setting in most conditions. The battery life is good for medium and low brightness setting which is more than enough for many times. I scratched the paint on the top section after 2 uses but the seller is helpful in providing solutions to make this right.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant -- in both senses of the word
customer_reviews.text: I am a PADI dive instructor and I have packed and used this Volador light on three separate continents. It is a couple of years old now, and it is brilliant -- in both senses of the word! I bought a second light for my bride. I recommend it to students. It is smaller and tougher than any other light I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this light for over a year and finally took it on a night dive in Bonaire. Two buddies with matching, more expensive lights were blown away by the brightness of my light. My light overpowered theirs that i couldn't see where they were shining. Overall, a great value. I'll probably hook ahead and buy the next level up at 2000 lumens and keep this 1000 lumen for my backup.
customer_reviews.author: Cortez

customer_reviews.title: One use and that's it
customer_reviews.text: Got one use out of it. Not super bright. Took the battery out and stored it and went to use it again this year and the switch is broken and the battery is dead. Stored inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Takes a licking and keeps on ticking!
customer_reviews.text: Was interested in this Volador model because of the price. Used it on about a dozen dives so far. It works as advertised and has held up very well. The light at maximum setting is nice and bright. Love the rear switch, especially in my wrist mount for the dive light. Love that it comes with its own battery and single charger- couldn't ask for anything more for a single dive. Great value, I'll probably get another as a backup before my next extended dive trip.
customer_reviews.author: Dano

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: Used this light for backup in Truk Lagoon wrecks. I started calling it the "Light Saber". Very compact, bright and easy to operate. Dove it inside wrecks to 130'. I'm a former Navy Diver, NAUI Instructor and commercial diver. 5 stars if it keeps working for a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Marilee G Krinitt

customer_reviews.title: This light is bright
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and a bright light. Plus it has the fantastic only reachargeable battery I buy. Lasts forever and holds a charge for a loooooong use. This light is quality built and the perfect size for diving. Not big and bulky. I researched a long time and glad I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: Van Smith

customer_reviews.title: Solid dive light!
customer_reviews.text: This dive light worked fine. I like the press button off/on/cycle as it is hard to accidentally turn the light on. This light worked great on an 80 ft dive in the Gulf of Mexico and cleaned up nicely afterwards. I particularly like the set of three O-rings to insure a leak proof seal for the battery. Easy to charge, easy to load. but would recommend silicone lube on the rings each time.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D

customer_reviews.title: Quality item, good value.
customer_reviews.text: Great little dive light, batteries last for a full hour on highest of three settings. Good value for a quality product. Make sure to use a little silicon grease on the o-rings so they don't wear out. When they do you have a spare set in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cabezon

customer_reviews.title: Great Light but youre never sure if it off
customer_reviews.text: I use the light for spearfishing to look under rocks for fish during the day time. This is a great light, really powerful but just one this bothers me, the on switch (there is none) there is just a button you have to press 3 times to torn it off and since it is magnetic you are not sure if you pressed it all the way and you need to look into the beam if it is still on and if it is on then it’s really bright. I would have loved this light to have a real on / off switch so I could torn it on without the need to look at it.
customer_reviews.author: Yossi

customer_reviews.title: It’s bright
customer_reviews.text: This thing is bright! I’ve had it for over a month and haven’t had to recharge the battery yet. Did I mention that it’s bright? Only bummer is you have to cycle through all 3 brightness levels to turn it off. Works great both in and out of water.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good Light, Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I have taken this on about 20 dives now. It works well for night dives if you are looking for a small easy to use light. Not as bight as a large night flood light nor is it great during the day to point out different fish, but good for looking in dark spots like cracks and crevices. I like the push button on/off switch, much easier and reliable than the twist style. Overall I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy K. Meade

customer_reviews.title: Resolved issue quickly
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Seller quickly reached out and offered to replace the light for me. When I explained that I had already purchased another light due to time constraints, they agreed to provide me a full refund, which they processed immediately. I’m bummed on the product, but I couldn’t ask more from the company to resolve a product issue. Used once. Worked last night, charged battery, now it doesn’t work at all. I switched batteries from my primary and still nothing, but now I know the battery is good as it works in my primary. Have a dive tonight and have to go buy another secondary light. Not impressed. Choose a different light.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Clement

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Doesn't even work!!! My husband fully charged it and nothing. Wish I could return it. So mad. It was $50.
customer_reviews.author: mariya

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work right out Of the box:(
customer_reviews.text: Opened and charged the battery... red all directions, installed the battery...flashlight doesn't work. I am bummed!
customer_reviews.author: canoe141

customer_reviews.title: Works great for night dives and rental equipment
customer_reviews.text: I work in a dive shop and the expensive lights are great but costly to replace when lost are broken. Checked these out bought 4 and stand with holding rental's good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The light is bright and can be operated by one hand.
customer_reviews.text: I bought four similar diving lights, this is my favorite, is also the best effect, really great, it’s brightness is very bright, and convenient operation is very simple, only need one hand we can operate it very well, the diving depth of 110 it really great, it really is indispensable for divers, it’s battery is very durable, I already recommend it to all the people in need, because it’s really great.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Calvo Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact size for carrying in the outdoors or diving
customer_reviews.text: This is a really bright flashlight that can be used under water, so it is useful in wet or diving situations. Was pleased with how it performed over all and it is a nice size for caring in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Wanpaku

customer_reviews.title: great flashlight - perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I took this diving in the Maldives and it was terrific. I like the 3 settings of brightness, i used the lowest setting to check my gauges on a night dive cause the high setting was blinding! The battery lasted for at least 3 dives, the i would charge it for the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: diving flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Just bought good worry about the quality is not good. Not bad. The quality is good. I accidentally fell to the ground and didn't slide at all. The battery can be recharged
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Great light so far. Solid and well built. Magnetic switch works well; hoefully it will last. Low level is perfect for a night dive. Beam is possibly a little broader than I would prefer, but overall best light I have used in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Scubadriver

customer_reviews.title: Bright light, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from dive trip to Roatan. Love the light! Could see well into the overhangs without being close. Great light! Had friends impressed and wanting info so they could buy one. Good price too. There are brighter lights on market, but can't compete with the price.
customer_reviews.author: RDW

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box - did not work. I fully charged the battery and tried again and again - no luck. I have no patience for substandard products, ordered the SOLA light instead.
customer_reviews.author: Michal Jastrzebski

customer_reviews.title: Not magnetic
customer_reviews.text: Decent flashlight. You can read other reviews for more detail. Just wanted to mention, like others, that you may get one with no magnet on the end. The box and documentation says it is magnetic, but mine isn't. I compared to other 1000 lumen flashlights I have and I can confirm that seems to be a good number.
customer_reviews.author: e6bwhiz

customer_reviews.title: No charger or o rings.
customer_reviews.text: Just received my voldor dive flashlight, have not water tested it as of yet, but the package came without the charger and o rings listed in its package contents and on line description. Hope I can resolve this issue, stay tuned. Good news... Volador quickly responded to my review, and sent me a complete new flash light, charger, batter and o rings,thank you Volador for your quick customer service, completely satisfied with my 2 flashlights! Cant wait to use them.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: High quality of work
customer_reviews.text: The diving torch is well equipped. His length fits in the palm of my hand. His weight is very light, small size, convenient to put in my coat. I dunked my flashlight in the water for ten minutes, and it still worked. And it's waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Luca

customer_reviews.title: Okay light
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a couple of years. However the switch stopped working for me. I have other dive lights that have lasted much longer than two years. Would recommend finding another light.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I mainly go home late at night, there are few street lights nearby, and I'm a little scared. I decided to buy this flashlight. I don't feel too dark and I'm afraid. It's good.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks...
customer_reviews.text: ...especially for the price. Several other divers have been incredibly impressed with it compared to equivalent lumen high priced units. For the price, I am happy. I will edit if I have the switch problem some have referenced.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great light for diving
customer_reviews.text: Great underwater light. Good for 2 amptnospheres into the ocean. So bright u can use it anywhere. rechargeable batteries. Last a long time. Great light. Small and convenient
customer_reviews.author: Greg M.

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful and holds the charge for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like it. I have not used it under water yet but I like it on land. It gives a powerful beam and holds the charge for a long time. I use it sporadically but so far I have only charged it once in 6mo.
customer_reviews.author: baltic_wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Metal corrodes quickly
customer_reviews.text: The light works fine but after just a few dives the metal casing is terribly pitted and corroded. I have a Princeton Tec Genesis that I have had a for a couple years that still looks like new whereas this one looks awful after just one short dive trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for divers
customer_reviews.text: This flash light is bright! There are 3 modes, and simple to use. I can see every fish and rock even during night dive. Nice for divers!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very bright light. Have only done few beach dives ...
customer_reviews.text: Very bright light. Have about 100 dives on lite. First one I have owned that lasted this long and same experience for dive buddies. Don't like the 3 mode push button switch - would prefer just on/off. Did not reduce 5 stars as some may like that feature and it is a great lite.
customer_reviews.author: introth

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I have had this since June 27th and it still doesn't work. I have tried charging in several USB ports with no success. Maybe if they sent a charger that plugged directly into an outlet is might work.
customer_reviews.author: L  Floyd

customer_reviews.title: great job
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my father and he loved the brightness and the fact that you could put the rubber piece in there to keep it from turning on accidentally and wasting battery.
customer_reviews.author: king

customer_reviews.title: Durable for Deep Sea Fishing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother and just happy to say that I am partaking in the many meals he has prepared with using this flashlight to catch fresh lobster and fish. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Have used it 4 times underwater. Love it. Also use it as a regular flashlight as well. Pretty solid
customer_reviews.author: phi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flashlight, everything included in box
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flashlight. Everything is included in the box. I have been able to test out the water resistance yet but looks good. Light is really bright and offers many modes. Includes battery charger and batter with it.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Dive Light!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I have fallen in love with these lights. We have about 15 dives each with them and they work great! Buttons are easy to use and I like the three light settings. We have not had any leaks and have been to 100 ft with them. Definitely great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Kolb

customer_reviews.title: Sooo shiney!!!
customer_reviews.text: I do really like this light. It seems durable and is plenty bright enough for my uses. I haven't tested battery longevity but that is less of a concern to me since I charge it about every other time I use it. I haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Gunther

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Very bright! When I charged and installed the battery, I see a few O-rings and felt lubricant that's sealing it. Pretty confident that it'll work under water. Bringing it to a swimming pool first. Will update if it doesn't. The material is very heavy and feels strong. Solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy T.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing flashlight. It's so bright. One will definitely find their way with it. Shipping was fast. The flashlight is durable and comes with a lanyard. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer lodge

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Super brite! It says dive light but i dont dive. It works just fine out of the water too. Constructed well and a nice solid feel to it as well. Also has a lanyard. Also really appreciate the rechargeable battery
customer_reviews.author: Ozarkfresh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight is easy one-hand operation! Many diving flashlights require both hands.
customer_reviews.author: NCTexas

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Bought it a year ago to replace a lost light for my wife the scuba diver. Crazy bright, multi-level switch is a godsend. No issues, and very powerful for such a small light. I considered buying one for myself to keep in my vehicle for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Litella

customer_reviews.title: Actually Waterproof, durable and bright
customer_reviews.text: Tried a few cheap scuba torches and this one was by far the best. It's brightness compares with brand name scuba torches. I've tested it to depths of up to 40m on multiple dives. Battery life is good (~1.5 hours on full brightness) and additional batteries are cheap. A really great bargain if you don't want to pay 100+ usd for a brand name torch
customer_reviews.author: niv

customer_reviews.title: Great light and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Great light... works extremely well. The ON/OFF switch is super easy to use underwater! Would buy another as a back up.
customer_reviews.author: puckslpr

customer_reviews.title: a good back up light
customer_reviews.text: works like its supposed to...3 levels of brightness....at best 1000Lm....and a flashing mode. great for signaling. I bought it as a back up to my primary 2000Lm wrist mount light. great quality for the money. not a primary light but a great back up.
customer_reviews.author: the other one

customer_reviews.title: Bright light above and below.
customer_reviews.text: Great ffor diving. Long lasting battery. Light weight. Plenty bright..
customer_reviews.author: Bob Lewandowski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light. I have done 6 dives with it ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light. I have done 6 dives with it so far and it is always one of the brightest. I usually use it on the middle setting to avoid draining my battery. The battery lasts plenty of time. I used it for three hours on one charge and did not notice any change in brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Husband

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to try this light
customer_reviews.text: I like the design, especially the sealed magnetic switch. I won't able to dive with it any time soon, so it's going into the dive gear for now.
customer_reviews.author: D Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Great light for the price. Seems to be very durable as well
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Great dive lights at afford
customer_reviews.text: I took these on a liveaboard trim for 7 days, 4, 5 dives a day. The battery holds up well. Brightness and penetrating power are excellent. If you are going to get spare batteries for these, make sure you get the button tops ones. These flashlights will not with with the flat top batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Chung

customer_reviews.title: Very bright light
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these lights for a scuba trip. loved that the battery was rechargeable . my husband coveted it so I bought him one for our next scuba trip. His doesn't seem to hold a charge. I've paid more for dive lights that didn't perform as well.
customer_reviews.author: SLQ

customer_reviews.title: Great Light
customer_reviews.text: This light performed flawlessly up to 100 ft and is bright. I used the medium setting most of the time while night diving and the high setting was nice for daytime. I love that it came with the battery and charger, even though I didn't have to charge it the entire trip.
customer_reviews.author: RBNDEN

customer_reviews.title: Overall great light in the water and out!!!
customer_reviews.text: This light was just about what I expected for the price. I would have liked it to be slightly brighter, however for the money it is a reliable device and so far that rechargeable battery has done well. If you offer a light with just a little more power for not much more please contact me. (Volador) Thanks Jake
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Good light!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a decent price. It is well built to prevent flooding and has a strong light for looking in caverns and crevices.
customer_reviews.author: GQNUMB21

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Overall this a must have dive light. You have 3 brightness mode perfect for night diving for spiny lobsters. It's not bulky and for the price this is a win. Will definently buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tun K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Prefect light for looking into Caves and for Wreck diving.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and super bright. This is small enough to fit into my BC pocket and powerful enough to see inside crevices. I bought 2!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Dive light
customer_reviews.text: Getting ready to use light for first time on a dive trip. Will update review after my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Charles T. Harden

customer_reviews.title: Little value.
customer_reviews.text: There were always some points that disappointed me. Very poor quality. I am very disappointed. I was expecting better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Cote Drucilla

customer_reviews.title: Great!! Nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: Great!! Nice and bright! Hubby has had a few dive lights but really likes this one and finds it awesome for vision diving :)
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Bright. Well Sealed.
customer_reviews.text: Check O-rings each time you change battery before a dive.
customer_reviews.author: Jericho Sink

customer_reviews.title: Great budget light
customer_reviews.text: Bought these before going diving in Maui. One of our dives was early morning and these worked great! No leakage and very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Great little flashlight!!
customer_reviews.text: Very bright! Great little flashlight. Used this flashlight on our first night dive. By far the brightest flashlight in the group on the high setting, even more bright than the dive master. Ended up using the lowest setting because the medium and high were too bright for the water clarity we had in Barbados.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: VOLADOR Diving Flashlight, 1000 Lumen Waterproof Diving Torch Rechargeable Scuba Dive Lights 150M Underwater LED Flashlight White Submersible Lights with 1x 18650 Battery and Charger
feature_bullets: BRIGHT LIGHT - Equipped with high quality XM-L2 LED with over 50,000 hours lifespan. The maximum output brightness is up to 1000 lumens, gives you super bright white light underwater.
WORKING MODES - Magnetic tail switch, 4 working modes: High>Medium>Low>Strobe. Suitable for different situations. Continuous run time up to 1.5 hours.
SOLID CONSTRUCTION - Made of AL-6061-T6 aircraft-grade aluminum with military regulations III hard-anodized finish, abrasion and seawater corrosion resistance.
150M WATERPROOF - Special sealing design with IP68 waterproof level, available underwater 150 meters. Underwater lighting distance can be 80 meters.

PROFESSIONAL DIVE LIGHT - A professional lighting equipment for scuba diving, underwater fishing, salvage, and underwater photography. Also it can be used for camping, swimming, hiking, trekking, hunting, fishing, etc .

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
